description: Try our easy to follow Harissa Chicken Wings With Yoghurt & Polenta Chips recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Harissa Chicken Wings With Yoghurt & Polenta Chips
name: Harissa Chicken Wings With Yoghurt & Polenta Chips Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Scatter chicken wings with spring onion and serve with polenta chips, lime wedges and yoghurt dressing.
